metadata.title: Clearly Charming Heart to Dance Laser Italian Charm Bracelet Link
features: Add to your Italian Charm bracelet
Our charms are compatible with other major brands
Use to create unique custom jewelry
description: This is a 9mm medium size Italian Charm. It will make a great addition to your Italian charm bracelet or a perfect personalized gift. Commemorate special occasions, capture memorable moments, or simply show off your favorite things by creating your own original Italian charm bracelet. Add Clearly Charming premium quality interlocking modular Italian charm links to your Italian Charm Bracelet and create your own memory bracelet.
